website_summaries.verdict: This wiggling alligator is made of all-natural, sustainable materials and features plenty of sound-producing moving parts to keep little ones entertained. Oodles of fun and eco-friendly to boot.
pros: Crafted from rubber trees that have ceased to produce latex
The body "clacks" and the jaws "snap" while the alligator is in motion
Comes with a long, sturdy cord for fuss-free pulling
Made by an award-winning company that's known for its environmentally conscious practices
cons: Wheels can be somewhat loud on hard floors, and the clacking body and chomping jaws aren't particularly quiet

customer_reviews.title: New model doesn't work like the original!!!
customer_reviews.text: These alligators were the GREATEST thrill for toddlers. Unfortunately the mfgr. removed the rubber surface from the wooden wheels so that on hard surfaces (such as wood, tile, vinyl...) the wheels slide rather than roll; the once delightful action of the alligator doesn't "act" . What a disappointment and an embarrassment to gift this to a friend's child and realize that it's a "Misfit Toy". Did Plan Toys get bought out by a hedge fund, hence thoughtless cost cutting??? Update: Mfgr's website shows the foam rubber traction rings on the alligator's wheels. DId MMP living sell me an unauthorized knock-off?
customer_reviews.author: zz

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as original. No rubber wheels
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the original. Actually made with a metal axel and bot wood. The wheels have no rubber as advertised in the ad. Not what I wanted. I wanted the original. The picture shows it but this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Safe, long-lasting and adorable toy! A win!
customer_reviews.text: So well made and an adorable design. Did a ton of research and love that this is made with baby-safe water-based paint (no lead, no phthalates, etc) solid wood, and not made in China (plant is in Thailand). Length of cord is good for pulling and not too long to get caught up in.
customer_reviews.author: bookends

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Choking Hazard
customer_reviews.text: The small wooden pegs that connect the jaw of the alligator were loose. The pegs are very small parts that present a choking hazard for children. Fortunately I was able to get them out of my child's mouth before they were swallowed. I'm very disappointed and wish that I had gone with a toy that had a painted on face instead. This toy is too dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Miechelle

customer_reviews.title: The cutest snail!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this snail (probably more than my own son)! He likes to play with it, but I think I got it too early for him (either that or he doesn't understand how to use it). When he walks, he picks the whole things up and walks with it dangling in the air. It's honestly super cute, but I did notice the toy is recommended for ages 18 months and up. The toy itself is beautifully made with colors that aren't too bright and a perfect finish. I would def recommend purchasing this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Better Than the Alligator!
customer_reviews.text: We have the snail and the Dancing Alligator. This one is better. While the Alligator certainly makes more noise and is a great toy, it is prone to tipping over and our toddler ends up just dragging it around on its side or its back. The Snail however, has no "upside down". It works right side up or upside down and always manages to right itself if it gets on its side for some reason. Can't say the same for the Alligator. Our family is happy with both. Nevertheless if this is your first purchase and you're trying to decide between the Snail and the Dancing Alligator, you might be happier with the Snail.
customer_reviews.author: In California

customer_reviews.title: Will only work on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: It is not the same toy that is shown on Amazon. The rubber is missing from the wheels. It will only work on carpet. The wheels will not turn on wood or linoleum because the rubber is missing, the wheels just slide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An instant favorite
customer_reviews.text: As soon as this gator came out of the box, my son started playing with it. Weeks later, he hasn't lost interest at all. Thankfully, the clacking sound is entertaining, but not annoying. The toy is well made; it only shows minor scrapes or wear after being dragged upside down across the pavement. Most of the time it stays right-side-up just fine, but sometimes my toddler carries it away by the string or just gets too excited and ends up dragging it on its back or side. The string is long enough that I can walk the alligator without stooping too much, which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted and environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: Plan Toys are the best! I saw them at a local baby boutique, but couldn't justify spending that much money on the products. Then, I saw them on here for a better price than the brick and mortar store. Then, I read about their products. Oh my goodness, I thought I was doing a good thing by buying wooden Melissa and Doug toys! This toy is beautifully crafted and environmentally friendly. These are things I want my child to care about when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smash hit
customer_reviews.text: It gets dragged everywhere and holds up well. Solid construction and self-rights if it gets knocked around. It will also make the same movements whether it is being dragged upside down or rightside up. My baby loves this toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: NoRegerts

customer_reviews.title: Go, Gary, Go!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son when he was 9 months old. He had very little interest in it initially. He was a late walker at 15 months. Around 18 months, he really started to "get" the pull toy concept. He now enjoys taking his snail for walks all over the house. Aesthetically, plan toys are so much nicer than the typical plastic eyesores you see everywhere. Gary is adorable to look at, and very durable. He shows some slight wear on the tops of his eyes as a result of my son "walking" him in the upside-down position on the kitchen floor; but it just gives him some character. Bless his little snail heart.
customer_reviews.author: AWG

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but not a hit for us
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made wooden toy and it's really cute, but it does not work particularly well on our tile floors. It doesn't always pull along properly and seems to frustrate my son a bit. I wish it moved from side to side like some other pull toys, because the "inchworm" type motion this toy makes is not very entertaining and my 1 year old doesn't seem that interested in it. It does make a pretty loud clunking sound, which I don't mind, but it's just not very engaging for the kid. It's too bad because it's really cute and I love this company, they make great toys!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute colorful pull snail.
customer_reviews.text: There was this toy when our family visited my wife's friend's daughter's second birthday party. Among 10+ kids my son bravely grabbed this toy and was crawling with it. He fell in love with it, I had to get it. Once we bought one he was really happy. Now he is little over Year and half but he still plays with it. It is made out of solid wood and the pulling mechanic is awesome that even adults like it. The colors are nice and overall build quality is nice. Plan Toys makes good quality toys, I have another plan toys with car rails. Overall I recommend this product.!
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy by Plan Toys! My daughter got this when she was about a year old, she is now 2.5 and still plays with it, and the toy is not showing any wear even though she dropped it and bumped it many times. The quality is great, it is sturdy, solid wood, nicely painted without any imperfections (we also have a pull toy by Hape and it is NOT nearly as nice as this one). The alligator makes noise when pulled, with the body parts moving, and it is fun to pull. She also likes to just carry it around and put it in her cart and push it around. Love Play Toys!
customer_reviews.author: naturalmama

customer_reviews.title: Cute little snail
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little pull along snail! I will say that my son never showed too much interest in it, but that isn't due to the lack of cuteness or fun of this toy. It's just not "up his alley" I guess. When you pull the snail he appears to be "slugging" up and down. I chose the snail over the other creatures as it still works if it gets tipped upside down which is an important feature when a baby or toddler is using it. Anyway, I think it's totally cute and hoping baby boy #2 shows more interest in it.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to walking her snail!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old loves her snail. She takes him for a walk everywhere - the county fair, the beach, the yard, the house. If he flips over, she stops and straightens him out. I'm not quite sure why, but he keeps her attention and she has to walk everywhere with him. He has been a big hit with other toddlers - creating my first big "sharing" problem. They all flock to this silly little snail. The paint on him is wearing but I haven't had any issues with it falling apart. It's still intact the way he came. We wipe him down with a clorox wipe and wash the little string and he's like new again, just faded.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ham Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Toy, My Toddler Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy LOVES this snail. He pulls it all over the house! I chose this one over the alligator because other reviews says this one doesn't really have an upside down, and will keep rolling no matter which way it's flipped. I am SO GLAD I took the advice of others, because it really can flip over easily and I can see how frustrating it would be if it would no longer roll once flipped. This one keeps on going! The movement it makes as it is pulled is adorable. One of our better toy purchases, since this actually gets played with!
customer_reviews.author: Buttrcp

customer_reviews.title: Toy that's fun for adults and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a popular toy in our house, even moreso as my toddler daughter is getting older (she's 18 months now). The clackity-clak of the alligator is a fun delight and she gets such a kick out of pulling it behind her. Even though my daughter has been walking--running!--for many months now, the fun of this toy remains. Plus, the adults like it, too! It's really creative and unlike the other traditional pull toys you generally see in the store. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: LisaMH

customer_reviews.title: Holes in the wall!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for a toddler! I'm having some issues with it now that my son is 4 though. He runs through the house at full speed pulling it around and when he changes direction he swings it in the air and I'll tell ya, due to the solid wood construction of the product this snail will put holes in the wall! When he starts playing with it myself and the dogs all run for cover immediately. I'm pretty sure it could break your shin bone. Great product! Solid wood and beautiful colors that will bring nothing but joy to your child as they terrorize every living creature in your house with it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Rdee

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome pull toy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. It's wooden, durable, has the illusion the snail is doing its snail trail. The best part is if your child accidentally flips it upside down, the child can easily pull and it'll start going again. A lot of other toys can only be pulled right side up. Be careful, the wood will get super destroyed outside but who cares just buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This alligator is so cute! It feels “heavy” (not too heavy) and solidly built. The colors are gorgeous and my 1 year old is thrilled to hear it clacking across the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Troy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made toy
customer_reviews.text: My one and a half year old son liked the alligator a lot initially, but has since lost interest. I'm going to put it away for a while and see if he likes it more when hes a little older. It is cute, but fair warning, it is really really loud on hard floors!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Classic, Great for young walkers
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I gave it to my daughter at 12 months, she really didn't know what to make of it. Now at 17 months she likes to pull it around after her and listen to it click clack. This thing is very loud! We don't mind in our family, but if you were trying to listen to the radio or TV over the din of this clacking around, good luck. I'd rather hear this then electronic toys any day. We made a small knot in the end of the pully string to give our daughter a little something extra to get a grip on while pulling around Mr. Snappy.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Mom

customer_reviews.title: German Toys
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, well made, entertaining, fun for the little one and great kid friendly, environment friendly packaging. Took it out to check it out when it came in the mail, and put it back when done - one would've never known it'd been taken out for inspection - and come Christmas morning my fifteen month old could open it himself - without mom and dad and a knife, scissors or screwdriver. The string is a good length for pre-schoolers pull toy - not an easy find these days, and the noise and wiggle movement keeps him captivated. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of toys from my childhood
customer_reviews.text: Love the click-clacking noise it makes as my granddaughter runs down the hallway pulling this toy behind her! Well-made, quality wood, so-far it’s indestructable, bright green color, Very happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee S.

customer_reviews.title: My 1-Year Old Niece Adores It!
customer_reviews.text: Darling toy, very well made, and so cute! My one-year old niece pulls it around, and she likes the clacking sound it makes as it rolls along (so does her cat, which can't resist chasing it!) It's a well-made, quality toy, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Burt

customer_reviews.title: This is a delightful little toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this alligator for my 14 month old baby who had recently begun walking. I am a wooden toy fanatic and this toy fit the bill! It is a wonderfully cute toy! It is the perfect size for a baby (you don't want a toy too big because they won't have the strength to pull it). The alligator looks very cute as it is being pulled, and the clacking noise it makes is actually not annoying. I have had this for several months now and would definitely recommend it. We have never had any problems with it, and it looks like it will last a long time (I'll be passing in on to my future niece or nephew).
customer_reviews.author: momof3sweeties

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I surely appreciate all the reviews of this item! I just couldn't tell whether I wanted to get it or not, and had it on my wish list off and on for a few years! I love yellow, and love it with red and orange. But a snail? Well, as some of the other reviewers explained, it is adorable, both in how it looks and in how it moves. It's a good size, too--not too small, not too big. It's packed well and not too difficult to open. I have a Plan Toys activity bus and a Plan Toy wooden teddy bear that I really love. Looks like this snail is another winner!
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, Quality Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my step-brother's baby, and it became her favorite toy. He had another baby, and it's become one of HER favorite toys, too! The girls just don't get tired of it. Noisy, but a sturdy, safe, quality toy that kids love. I also like that it's the kind of toy that can become a family heirloom to be passed on to THEIR kids some day. My Mom just had me order one for her to give as a gift, because she never sees her grandkids without theirs and knew it would be a guaranteed hit.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Best pull toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: This pull toy works on both sides, so even if it tips over it immediately corrects itself and continues smoothly. Works great on hard floors and good on carpet. My 1yo immediately started to pull the snail and loved the up and down movement of the head and I watched as it immediately corrected itself when she accidentally kicked it. If i had to say something negative, I wouldn't mind if the pull string were a little bit longer, but overall I am so glad I chose this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sailing Sister

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why kids love this so much, but they do. I’ve seen toddlers and preschoolers fight over it at music class. Both my 18m old and 5-year-old play with it. And like (nearly) all Plan Toys, it’s great quality.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little alligator pull toy! The noise makes it fun for baby! I love the rainbow color. It's smaller than I expected but it doesn't bother me. I would definitely buy this toy again and will look at other toys by the same brand!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew a few years ago for a Christmas present. Last year, I bought it for my friend's little boy who not only plays with it but uses it for physical therapy in walking backwards, pulling, and other exercises that he sees as just playing. Both boys love the toy and I have not heard a single negative thing about them. I will certainly by another when my next nephew is big enough to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Coralie Crumrine

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this despite being a litte skeptical because it looks so simple. I wondered about how entertaining it would actually be. I bought it anyway, based on the good reviews and I am glad I did (and now am adding my own)! My 2 year old niece absolutely loves this toy - she pulls it around everywhere. Sometimes it flips over but she doesn't seem to care, she just keeps dragging it along behind her. She is really rough on toys too and this has held up quite well so far. Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Monica F

customer_reviews.title: and they both turned it into their favorite "pet", walking it wherever they went
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what it is about this toy, but I got it for 2 grandsons at around 18 months, and they both turned it into their favorite "pet", walking it wherever they went. One would even pick him up to carry across gravel or sand, so as not to get his "feet" dirty. Simple fun for them both.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pull toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought our toddlers several different pull toys, including the Melissa and Doug frog, and this alligator is by far their favorite. We think that the "clacking" noise it makes when pulled is the reason. They seem to really like the sound of the alligator "dancing" behind them. And I can honestly say, it is noisy but not too annoying (most of the time, anyway!). I prefer wood clacking over animated plastic toys any day of the week! Overall, this is an excellent, well-made and adorable toddler toy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: We got this as a gift and my daughter loved it so much I bought it as a birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift and my daughter loved it so much I bought it as a birthday gift for an one yr old and I hear she really likes it too! Very sturdy, The paint survived being dragged all over my hardwood floors and made a great clicking noise when pulled. This is a classic children's toy everyone should get. I'm also very happy with other toys from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but a little too loud
customer_reviews.text: Plan Toys does great toys... This crocodile is awesome... However one big caveat: it is VERY loud / noisy when the woods slices strike together.... Our toddler loves it of course, but it makes my ears very tired... especially if you have hard wood floors! If you dont mind the noise, otherwise it is very well made and designed and cute / fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: TheFrenchFamilyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but loud toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few smaller ones like this years ago and gave them away as stocking stuffers and they were a hit. I was excited to see this bigger one available. It is well made and a fun gift for kids up to 6-7. Actually, I wouldn't mind having one for myself! It's very loud though, as the wood pieces go clicky clack when it's dragged. A great gift for kids. You may want to provide some sort of handle to tie to the end of the rope that comes with it so it's easier for kids to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Jules in LA

customer_reviews.title: Liked It So Much I Bought It Twice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my co-worker's baby's first Christmas. I thought it was so cute and the mom likes wood toys. When Ethan opened it, my friend started laughing because the same little alligator was in the gifts our office gave the baby when he first came home! And I was the one who chose the gifts! I offered to return it but Ethan and his parents like it enough that they wanted to keep both of them... Adorable toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rocklin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!! Love how it inches along.... except my 17 month old loves to RUN around the house with it! It is durable!!!
customer_reviews.author: 1review

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Best 1-3yr old gift. Worth the price. My 1yr old got it as a gift and we needed to re-buy it for her sister.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2under2

customer_reviews.title: Gator pull toy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Only downside is she broke it after only a few months. It was on a bookcase, she was trying to reach it, it fell off bookcase and our hard wood floors and the back wheel dowel broke in half, so it was minus one wheel. She still played with it with only 3 wheels, it was just a little louder then. 6 months later, the other back wheel broke off so it was down to 2 wheels. She still plays with it! So only 4 stars because it can break.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy that Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter when she was just beginning to walk, and now, 2 1/2 years later, she still loves this toy. She brings it into bed with her and carries it around. It's a lovely simple toy that has lasted the test of time. The only annoyance is that it's a little loud so I don't let her walk him when the baby's napping but otherwise it's a much more satisfying "noise" than any noise that comes out of most toys these days.
customer_reviews.author: MkW

customer_reviews.title: Really good toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is one and a half and just loves this alligator, I think it's his favorite toy, he likes the clicking noise that it makes when he pulls it across the floor. So many toys get shoved into the toy box after a short time but this one is a classic, it gets played with over and over, I'm very pleased with it and so is my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Wolfington

customer_reviews.title: Noisy tail-banging
customer_reviews.text: I expected the the alligator's middle section wooden plates to bang together, but I guess I didn't expect the tail to also be whacking against the floor. That would be fine if we lived in a single-family home, but it was unfortunately way too loud to subject our downstairs neighbors to. It is cute and well-made though.
customer_reviews.author: MWT

customer_reviews.title: Cute well made toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute, well made toy. We have lots of items from PlanToys, they have a nice design and I like that they are sustainable. This little guy is a little clunky, my toddler doesn't love it but maybe he will come around to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good little pull toy
customer_reviews.text: Great little pull toy. My toddler loves it! Seams to be holding up very well to the abuse (no issues after being in service for a few months now). Love that it is a real wood toy, not some cheap plastic or battery powered thing. Be warned: it is surprisingly loud! Especially on wood floors. Some parents will see this as a negative. But like i said, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H

customer_reviews.title: Pull-along toy leads to smiles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pull-behind toy. It's colorful and enamoring to watch. Plan Toy is always a good option and I'm glad I got this pull-behind toy because 1) it's not noisy (thus no clacking), 2) it moves whether it is right side or wrong side up, and 3) I feel good about supporting a company that wants to make toys for sustainable play, thus being respectful to the environment and trying to do their part in being a responsible toy-manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E N Kohrs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy...get this!
customer_reviews.text: We love, love, love this alligator. It was a little smaller than I was expecting, but it has given my kids HOURS, and HOURS of fun! My 2 year old would pull this around the house laughing histerically and my 9 month old would chase him in his walker...squealing with delight...all the while the alligator's click clacking away. I will say it got pretty loud, but I don't really care so long as the kids are having fun. My younger son just started walking last week and can pull the alligator around now, and he still loves! Definitely worth investing in!
customer_reviews.author: LEBOOT

customer_reviews.title: Classic Wooden Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's first birthday because he was constantly pulling shoes around the house by the laces. He LOVES it. It was the hit of the party for kids from age 7 months to 7 years old. It is just stinking cute - it moves along like an inchworm. But better than that, it is frustration-free for little ones. If it is on its side, it immediately rights itself as soon as he begins to pull it. And it works equally well upside down and right side up, so if he switches directions as he walks, it just keeps inching along. I love giving classic, well made toys that don't require batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rickerts

customer_reviews.title: Great you!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and well made. It makes a clicking sound when you pull it. My 17 month old loves this toy. After some typical toddler play, which is on the not so gentle side, the paint is already wearing on some small spots. I guess that is to be expected. Otherwise I'd have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Pull-along snail
customer_reviews.text: This colorful wooden pull-along snail is an exceptionally well-made toy for toddlers, and one I was happy to give as a gift to our almost-walking granddaughter. Her parents were delighted with it, and were amazed at the other toys produced by the company. Although we had to wait a little longer to receive the toy, it arrived well before our family's delayed Christmas. We were pleased to be able to give a high quality toy that has heirloom possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: D. Nussbaum

customer_reviews.title: Cute Click Clack Alligator Pull Toy
customer_reviews.text: My eighteen month old daughter loves to "take alligator for a walk" around the block in our neighborhood and often insists on taking him when we go to the park or out in the car. The alligator makes a cute clacking sound as it is pulled along and has a good length string (which is not the case on another pull toy we purchased). Despite very frequent use, the toy has held up well. As would be expected, the alligator will turn over occasionally, but overall we have loved having this pull toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: fun for all
customer_reviews.text: This toy is really fun. At least, when I gave it to my granddaughter who is just starting to walk, I think that her parents played with it as much as she did. It bobs up and down as it rolls along. The string is just the right size for a 1-year-old. It makes a lot of noise on a wood floor. It is sturdily built of renewable wood in Thailand. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is so adorable! A classic type of toy with a modern ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable! A classic type of toy with a modern look and bright, gender-neutral color scheme is exactly my sort of toy. Seems very well made and has held up to lots of mauling.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Winstead

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a bit too young (12 months) to really get that he's supposed to pull this toy - mostly loves chewing on the string, which has stood up to that quite well - but I've tried this little snail out and it works just as advertised. It rights itself every time. I absolutely love that and it is just a darling, enchanting toy. Beautifully painted, durable, really could be an heirloom toy. I couldn't be more pleased and will definitely purchase more toys from this wonderful company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Isabeau Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Loved this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I just love, love, love this toy. It makes noise when you pull it, and it makes pulling it very interesting for a 13 month old. I like that the string is long (more than a foot long), so you can pull it closer or farther from you. The length of the string is also good for taller toddlers. And for short toddlers, will continue to work well as the toddler gets older and taller.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline H

customer_reviews.title: Love him
customer_reviews.text: Daily play, this is our second one - first rainbow, both are going strong and dearly loved by the kids. And the quality is timeless, they will last and last...
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Oz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! I bought this for my 19 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I bought this for my 19 month old grand daughter for her Easter basket this year. Although she has not seen it yet, I'm sure she will love it. If you are looking for a QUIET pull toy, this is it! You won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: T. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy but it broke after only 2 months of toddler play :/
customer_reviews.text: My kids ages 1 and 3 love this toy! Played with it every day. Unfortunately my 3 year old was climbing onto our couch with it and it dropped onto our tile floor and a wheel broke off. I was so sad cause we only had it for 2 months and really loved it. My kids are not very rough with toys and I was so surprised that it broke from just 1 fall and not from very high. Very sad cause it was definitely a favorite during the small amount of time we had it
customer_reviews.author: Docholidayng007

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves to play with it; when it's not tipped over.
customer_reviews.text: This toy makes a fun clacking noise when pulled behind my 2 year old nephew (he's had it for about a year and still plays with it). The problem is that once it tips over, his busybody hands and mind aren't nimble or patient enough to put it upright again. So, playtime last for about 5-10 seconds and then it's on to something else. This problem could probably be avoided if the wheels were wider, but that's not a solution the consumer can take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a boy turning one. The alligator rolls, and the head and tail dip up and down. It's a good toy. Pull string, so the alligator can "follow" the child.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heiss

customer_reviews.title: This is too stinkin' cute to pass up!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of cutest simple toys I've ever seen! Adorable! The snails body actually moves up and down kind of like an inch worm would. So cute. My twin nineteen month old boys Love it too. They love pulling it around! I wish I could rare it higher! If you have toddlers you should get this! In fact I bought another one for a friends twin toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This snail is surprisingly larger than I expected, very sturdy and well made, and is wonderful at being pulled upside down as well as turning itself back over when it goes on its side. My 1yr old loves pull toys, and the string is long enough (rare nowadays with pull toys) for him to stand up and have it be behind him. He adores his snail! Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Hillargh

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: She loved dragging it behind her walker. Love that it’s wood and nothing can hurt herb
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy to encourage walking!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves his Gator. It is so we'll built! We were looking for something to encourage walking at 12 months, and the rainbow alligator did just that!
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLauren

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden toy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely despise electronic toys for young children! With that being said, this is a great battery-free toy! My kids (1 and 3) love playing with this! He has been well loved and well played with and still looks brand new! I particularly like how the wheels have a band of rubber on them. It helps them turn rather than slide. Plus, the click-clack noise isn't annoying!
customer_reviews.author: JKro328

customer_reviews.title: 13 month old and almost 3 year old love this thing and drag it all over the place
customer_reviews.text: 13 month old and almost 3 year old love this thing and drag it all over the place. SO LOUD though from the clacking! Hubby put little pads on the inside to help cut down the extremely loud clacking (Especially in a tile floor apt)
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Cute Alligator
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little boy for his first birthday. He is attempting to walk and I hope this will be the motivation to get him to walk more. He loves watching me play with it and it's very durable. This is one of those toys where he won't grow out of quickly, like most toys I've seen. He can play with this inside and outside and have a constant companion. It does make a clacking sound but it's mild compared to the noises other toys make.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smillie

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. Got it for her for her 1st birthday. She loved it immediately and dragged it all over the house. She is almost two and still plays with it at least once a week. It is also a favorite toy of any of her friends that come to visit. It is well made and the string is sturdy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but doesn't roll well on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The little alligator is adorable and appears to be well made. My one complaint is that it doesn't work well on hard surfaces. The wheels are set to make it "dance" but the front wheel doesn't seem to get enough traction on laminate or tile flooring and it ends up just sliding along with only the rear "dancing." We tried it out on carpeting and it seems to work a bit better, but it's a little disappointing that it doesn't roll well on the hard surfaces that comprise most of our house.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kruegel

customer_reviews.title: A longstanding favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful toys--whimsical, interesting to look at, and a favorite as soon as your baby really starts walking. I have two walking toys, and they are both major hits. This can be loud on bare floors, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: churcmo

customer_reviews.title: Plan Toys favorite for years!
customer_reviews.text: Plan Toys makes wonderful children's toys - "recycled" rubber tree wood and wonderful colors with "green" paint. This snail has been a favorite of our boys for years. It has a whimsical movement when pulled and has now logged many miles across the kitchen & around the block. This is one of our favorite unisex baby gifts to give, too.
customer_reviews.author: skt

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now bought this for 3 different kids because it’s so popular. My 5 year old granddaughter has played with this since she started walking and still plays with it. This little alligator has been put through the ringer in every way a kid can come up with and has survived. It’s a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: LizTiz

customer_reviews.title: amazing product, well worth the value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I bought this as a gift for a friends son, and will be coming back to buy one for mine!! She is totally impressed with all the Plan Toys now! Sooooo cute, and the wiggle action is great! Keeps my friends 1 year old boy entertained all the time and hes not even walking yet! Its hard to find a high quality, environmentally responsible, totally nontoxic, all-wood, educational toy thats so affordable. This is the best ever!!! I love love love Plan Toys!!
customer_reviews.author: DreadyMawma

customer_reviews.title: Happy alligator
customer_reviews.text: When this little guy is following my niece around, it's cuz she's carrying it around and snuggling it (I know, it's not very snuggly, but *shrug* 16-month-olds, ya know?) It makes a really satisfying clackity sound when it rolls and wiggles delightfully. In the words of a 16-month-old "happy!"
customer_reviews.author: Duplikatekate

customer_reviews.title: Die needlichsten Schnecke
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little toy EVER. I love the old-fashioned toys that stimulate cause and effect play without batteries and reliance on lights and noise and overstimulation. This little guy hearkens back to a simpler, nicer time. The colors are vivid, the movement entertaining, and the quality seems excellent. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Boone

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cute toy! The back "hops" ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy! The back "hops" as it gets pulled behind. I bought it for a friend's daughter and will definitely be getting it for mine when she can walk!
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Best 1st birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy. It is his favorite. His parents really like how it is made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazkrison Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Super cute and makes my daughter laugh to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: She LOVED it and would drag it around everywhere
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for her birthday when she was one years old. She LOVED it and would drag it around everywhere. She's now 18 months old and although she doesn't play with it quite as much, she still loves it and it's among her favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: JJ_MC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pull toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pull toy! It's adorable, but most importantly functional. It always rights itself if it tips over on its side, so no frustration from it turning over and having to stop to fix it. We've had it for over 2 years and it looks great and is still going strong. Quality wood construction and bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's first birthday. I keep it put away most of the time due to the string (possible strangle risk). I let her play with it with supervision. She loves it! She will crawl and walk while pulling it around. She thinks it is great! It really is a cute little toy.
customer_reviews.author: alynn

customer_reviews.title: 16 month old LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this. It's cute and well-designed. He loves the click-clack sound, even though it's loud and drives me up a wall sometimes. I find I have to hide it on occasion because he plays with it SO much that there's a constant click-clack in my house :-)
customer_reviews.author: This Happy Homeschool

customer_reviews.title: I also like that it has a longer string
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old son LOVES this alligator! He pulls it with him everywhere. I also like that it has a longer string. Many pull toys have a short string and when my son tries to pull them the toys barely touch the ground. This one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lea Joens

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cute and durable. When a child pulls the string at the front of the alligator it rolls on the floor making a clacking sound. I am embarrassed to admit how many times this toy has been dropped on accident or fallen off of a table and it is still in perfect condition. This would make a good first birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bell

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to my Parisian friend’s 1 year old boy
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: A future heirloom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8 years ago and it has been beloved by both my children. The paint chipped a little over the years as it banged into things, but it did not peel. The motion is smooth and adorable and despite its wooden consteuction it seems very animated. Both my kids slept with it at times. Of all the toys they've owned, this is the one I'll definitely save for grandchildren. Plan is a company I can feel good about and the quality is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Walking toy
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old grandson loves this. He plays with it all the time. He has learned that if he waves it around wildly and hits him self in the head, it hurts. He has not injured himself and I think toys like this are part of learning about "dangers" of the world. Of course he was closely supervised until he learned this.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and well made. Would give it 5 stars but the colors are darker than pictured. Which is fine just not what i was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: rolls even when flipped over
customer_reviews.text: My 13 mo old doesn't really play with this, but I think he might like it later on. It is really cute and "inches" along. And the best feature is that when flipped over it still works. UPDATE: lowered to 3 stars because after being slammed down by a 2 year old friend, it broke. I need our toys to be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: busy mama

customer_reviews.title: it's neat
customer_reviews.text: this toy is pretty neat. it makes cool wood-on-wood clickity-clackity sounds. the little girl i bought it for (1 year old) seems to really like it. no educational value, but so what. the craftsmanship is nice, and the parents seemed to love it. i'll probably buy this or something similar for my baby when he starts trying to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Close

customer_reviews.title: Pull-along Snail+++++
customer_reviews.text: my little neighbor loves her snailie and pulls it all over the wood floors with great delight. Parents and grandparents may be less enthusiastic, Wooden pull toys and building toys are great!
customer_reviews.author: J M Theno

customer_reviews.title: I bought his for my great nephew & my friend's little girl and both LOVE ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I bought his for my great nephew & my friend's little girl and both LOVE it. They are 1.5 yrs and almost 2. I bought it because I was in a store & saw a little girl playing with it and having a blast. She was about 2.5 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: capricorn76

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was ugly...BUT grandkids LOVED it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based upon other reviews. When it arrived, I was embarrassed to give it to our granddaughter. However, she and all the other grandkids younger than 4 loved this silly toy. I love solid wood toys. Just goes to show you, a child's mind is so different from this 54 yr. old grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Endoannie

customer_reviews.title: My daughter absolutely loves this, it has held up ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this, it has held up to a ton of abuse. My only complaint is a lack of a handle on the rope, but we handled this by taking a small stacking ring and looping the rope through it, and now my daughter has a much easier time holding onto it. For reference, the orange ring off of the Melissa and Doug stacking toy does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: ETA

customer_reviews.title: Fun, well-made and "greener" than your average toy
customer_reviews.text: The "Dancing Alligator" is simply but thoughtfully designed, attractively finished in a bright green color and gets children's attention with it's loud and animated movement. It operates easily and the pull string has plenty of length, especially if you want to demonstrate for your child. We are fans of the Plan Toy products we've purchased so far and will continue to buy their products.
customer_reviews.author: the.jack

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st Birthday Present!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his 1st birthday. It immediately captured his interest and has been a favorite ever since. He had just started walking and doesn't yet understand how to always keep the alligator on the ground as he pulls it behind him, so sometimes he just picks it up by the string and carries it to me for help. He will then chase after it while I pull it around the house. I'm delighted by how much he loves this simple, cute, inexpensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sweet quiet toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My older son has the alligator by Plan Toys, and it is great but LOUD. This one makes a nice, sinusoidal motion as it crawls along, and isn't completely quiet (it is wooden) but it doesn't clang with each step. I think it is very calming and I love watching the kids play with both of these toys.
customer_reviews.author: N. Black

product_meta.title: PlanToys (5105) Wooden Dancing Alligator Push and Pull Toy
product_meta.description:
Color:Dancing Alligator - GreenOur cheerful green and yellow Dancing Alligator is sure to bring on a case of the giggles. This classic wooden pull toy makes a gentle click-clack sound when pulled and delights toddlers and preschoolers. 24 inch long string is safely inserted. Made from chemical free rubber wood and non-toxic dyes and pigments, our gator is sure to help children with their gross motor skills and encourages their imagination. Measuring 3.9 x 9.7 x 3.7 inches, Dancing Alligator wooden pull toy combines learning with fun. At PlanToys, our mission is to provide children with sustainable, eco-friendly toys that encourage early learning, fire the imagination, and stimulate the senses. Our toy designers craft fun products which encourage all aspects of a child’s development including gross and fine motor skills, language skills, social development and interaction, and much more. All PlanToys products are made from rubber wood trees which no longer produce latex. The rubberwood used is free of chemicals and is kiln dried to assure it remains chemical free. Our toys are assembled using a certified E-Zero formaldehyde free glue. Organic pigments and water-based dyes are then used to add color. A PlanToys toy is safe for your child, and assures a sustainable environment for their future. Suitable for children 12 months and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our cheerful green and yellow dancing alligator is sure to bring on the giggles. This classic wooden pull toy makes a gentle click-clack sound when pulled and delights toddlers. 24 inch long string is safely inserted. Made from chemical free rubber wood and non-toxic dyes and pigments, our gator is sure to help children with their gross motor skills and imagination. Measuring 3.9 x 9.7 x 3.7 inches, Dancing Alligator is the perfect companion for 12 month to 3 year old toddlers and preschoolers. Our wooden pull toy combines learning with fun. Our carefully crafted toys are made from non-toxic, natural materials such as organic rubberwood. PlanToys toys enable children to play and learn at the same time, and parents know the toys are manufactured in a sustainable way.
feature_bullets: Plan Toys Dancing Alligator has sold over 1 million copies since its introduction and continues to delights children.
Makes a gentle click-clack sound when pulled which is soft and not harsh.
Pull cord is 24" long and safely inserted into the Dancing Alligator and right-sized for toddlers
Recommended for children 12 months and older.
Sustainably crafted from chemical free rubberwood trees, formaldehyde-free glues, organic pigments, water based dyes, and safety tested

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars776 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
